title: Horde vs Alliance, Jedi vs Sith, Lissandra vs Ashe. Calling it now, Yasuo wins
body:
These competitions are never competitions in my opinion. ~~Edgy Teenagers~~ The majority of common gamers almost almost always likely to pick the edgier, 'cooler' side of any of these moral debate wars, try to nitpick every action and word of the 'light side' one to make them look bad while trying to justify blatantly heinous actions and intents to make their edgy side look acceptable.

Both skins are cool, but I think it is obvious Yasuo will win the event.

replies.body:
You're forgetting something, something that history tells us the majority of ~~horny teenagers~~ gamers like, which I believe will turn the tides in Orders favor.

Order has Riven, and Riven has boobs.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bkh501W5,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-06-15T23:42:56.130+0000)
>

> Order has Riven, and Riven has T H I C C

FTFY ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Light Side all the way over here.

All you edgy teens can play Shadow the Hedgehog or something.
I mean I am pretty sure all the new Wardens at the very least have to go with Riven.  I am half convinced this is just a way of testing us... thinning out our newfound ranks.

Chaos is not evil and order is not good. They are all shades of gray. It all comes down to what you like more as a personal taste.

Chaos is freedom, emotion, passion, unshackled, etc.

Order is control, neatness, presentation, logic, etc. 

When taken to the extreme, both ends of the spectrum are evil. Order is complete dominance over one person's individuality and free will, and chaos is unbridled destruction and savagery.
I mean, strictly yes, but in the comics Riven is presented as the light and Yasuo is presented as the darkness. I think it's pretty fair to use good vs evil dichotomy here.
If that was the case, then they would've named it good vs evil. These are shades of gray, not good or evil. Listen to the champion's quotes and you'll see what I mean.
please dont compre sith to yasuo, i would like to remember my childhood fondly
As an {{champion:266}} main I must embrace the edge in all forms, I have no choice.

Well, there are different rewards as well.
Yasuo's side has a chance to drop a Vayne skin, and Riven's side has a chance to drop an Annie skin.

Actually, this probably just means chaos will be more popular.
That alone made me half regret picking order.

You can change your side everyday over the two weeks, but you'd be a bit behind on tokens.  It's possible to get both if you switch halfway through the event, since it'd take 7 days get the Orbs, or if you don't switch, you can get the loading border for free, but you give up the chests.
or just buy stuff from the shop (ty rito)
nah who cares, I play riven anyway...

I don't care about a single Hextech exclusive skin currently.
They all look cool for sure but all are for the champions i don't care about. So i don't really have a preference, i'm in it for the orbs or crafting key frags, which both sides provide anyway.

But i have to choose one so i'd go for a champion i dislike 0.0000000000000001% less than the other and that's Riven.
No {{champion:113}} I'm sad. Is a three way lock down on frejlord not a two way

To be fair, Sej lost horribly in all regions except one. So it was never really a competition. Because if people wanted the 'righteous' side they choose Ashe, then all the people who like villainous, brutish or cruel people picked Liss because she was more ~~Aatrox~~ typical anime villain than Sej. If there was no Liss, Sej might have done very well.
^FeelsBadMan

The thing is Ashe true rival is Sejuani not Lissandra. Lore wise lissandra is an Ashe ally on paper (she has her own plans but as far as ashe is concern she is an ally) So the sides are Sejuani or Ashe and Lissandra on her own island until she reveals her intention (on the background)

Sejuani wasn't cool enough when Freljord Event was a thing.
So people either picked the cute archer Ashe or cool ice mage Liss.

Since i like mages, i picked Liss of course.

I think it has most ot do that when the Freljord Event was a thing Liss had just been launched and just had the Hype. Liss has no rivality with Sejuani other than being the descendant of Serilda, more over Ashe using the same bow as Avarosa which Liss despised (and ended up killing), plus procraming herself queen, made her more of a target for Lissandra. The whole thing with the popularity was because Lissandra was the last one to join. Ashe wasn't even popular back then as it is now

> [{quoted}](name=Mira Arya Enthe,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bkh501W5,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2017-06-16T01:40:22.696+0000)
>
> To be fair, Sej lost horribly in all regions except one. So it was never really a competition. Because if people wanted the 'righteous' side they choose Ashe, then all the people who like villainous, brutish or cruel people picked Liss because she was more ~~Aatrox~~ typical anime villain than Sej. If there was no Liss, Sej might have done very well.

There's also the fact that back then she was basically a gimped version of Nautilus and no one but lore buffs and hipsters gave half a fuck about the champion.
Don't think Yasuo will win when the entire community is on the fuck Yasuo stance tbh.
Oh my dear, dear Mira, you misunderstand gravely. Yasuo may have edgy teenagers, but Riven has a weapon that the Alliance and the Jedi never could touch. She has the power of THICC.
Sucks you can't vote without having RP

Riven is way more edgier than Yasuo.
For god's sake, her mini update that was on PBE and pulled back was even featuring an "edge" mechanic, at one point in time.

I tend to agree with you Mira but I think you might be wrong here, have you seen the boards opinion on Yasuo as of basically all eternity?
I know Riven isn't exactly well liked but I think Yasuo wins in terms of being hated.
i look forward to riven roflstomping yasuo.
not sure its because of that tbh, many more yasuo players than riven, and as well as people who dont play either usually tend to play yas over riven for carry potental anyways

Yeah...
Sadly that's the trend that all of these things take among gamers.
Empire vs Stormcloaks among that as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Keira Helsh,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bkh501W5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-15T22:03:25.708+0000)
>
> Yeah...
> Sadly that's the trend that all of these things take among gamers.
> Empire vs Stormcloaks among that as well.

to be fair, one of those groups was a bunch of jerkwads that tried to behead me for no good reason
wait, which one is the evil one in that matchup?

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bkh501W5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-15T22:52:17.154+0000)
>
> wait, which one is the evil one in that matchup?

Stormcloaks are traditionalist and want to protect their dying religion and keep Skyrim independant, but they're racists.  Empire is globalist and wants to unite everyone under the crown for the aid of all, but they have oppressive laws and a cruel system run by the Thalmor.  Basically both sides suck but one gets to rule Skyrim.

> [{quoted}](name=TwitchInMyPants,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bkh501W5,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2017-06-16T03:15:19.910+0000)
>
> Stormcloaks are traditionalist and want to protect their dying religion and keep Skyrim independant, but they're racists.  Empire is globalist and wants to unite everyone under the crown for the aid of all, but they have oppressive laws and a cruel system run by the Thalmor.  Basically both sides suck but one gets to rule Skyrim.

Empire vs Stormcloak is imperialists/colonists vs conservatives/rednecks.
Not so much evil so much as "edgy", you have to admit, it's more fun fighting for the rebel heretics than the pushover imperials.

Neither, really. It was to grey. One fought for honor and tradition, the other fought for a united human front. /shrug

I'll leave this here, Shrouded in the blinding light is peace, Embraced by darkness is freedom. Imo Peace > freedom.
Me and my friend group (4 of us, between 14 & 17) all picked Riven.
You fight the good fight.
TBH i'm supporting yasuo because I think it's the higher quality skin rather than anything moral.
Did you account for the T H I C C ?

Apparently people like the darkness more than the light, damn bats.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I picked Alliance and always go for the good guys unless said good guys are just the final fantasy kind of good guys.

I like Yasuo more than Riven and so I'm firstly completing his part, then I'll go for Riven if I have time.
HEY! I didnt pick horde because they are edgy. Alliance races are just boring AF

I feel like the choice is more about (well for me anyways):

> Q: What is an Orb of Order / Orb of Chaos?
A: The Orb of Chaos is event-exclusive and contains a guaranteed Legacy skin shard and a 50% chance to get a bonus drop. If your orb triggers a bonus drop, you’ll have a chance to get either a random amount of Chaos Tokens, two gemstones, or the Hextech-exclusive **Soulstealer Vayne** skin shard.

>A: The Orb of Order is event-exclusive and contains a guaranteed Legacy skin shard and a 50% chance to get a bonus drop. If your orb triggers a bonus drop, you’ll have a chance to get either a random amount of Order Tokens, two gemstones, or the Hextech-exclusive **Hextech Annie skin** shard.


One of these rewards is a skin for a champion with a pretty large playerbase; created because the champion as a whole has a high skill ceiling and feels rewarding once attained.

the other is a binary esque champion that barely sees play unless she's overtuned because she lacks depth and also the large pool of skins they already have, which means most likely people probably have a skin for them. Oh and also this champion for the past 3 seasons has primarily been played as a support. and we all know how popular supports are.
the majority of icons I've seen are riven icons

Why would you think that way, OP?

I mean, to put it bluntly, Riot obviously knows this so that's why they put our waifu Riven in the light position as opposed to Yasuo who is clearly in no need of another Dark-themed skin, so that there could actually be a competition, between the edgelords and the waifu-mastersthat is. Though I also really don't think most of the gamer population are actually just the edgelords and the waifu-masters. It's just that it may appear more prominent because many players have their personal stigma towards them so they give them extra attention.

And that said , It really just depends on a couple factors such as the end rewards (if there's any), and how players like the skin visually and icons etc rather than having anything to do with philosophy and stuff in the end of the day, as in, most of the "competitive" doesn't actually have anything to do with the actual competition here but rather most people would just choose sides based on whichever they think is cool and fun to look at.
I picked chaos just for the possible soulstealer vayne drop tbh otherwise I support the T H I C C

Order is riven.

I can't play riven.

SCREW THE ORDER, CHAOS IS HOW I LIVE
"There is no Chaos, there is Harmony." Order all the way!
